app.title: Smart Excel

userGuide.addApiKey: Please add your API Key in the settings to use all features.

settings.title: Settings
settings.apiKeyDescription: We will not upload your Key. The Key just only be stored in memory, and you will need to re-enter it after refreshing the page.

settings.emptyFormula: Please enter the formula you need to generate.
settings.apiKeyFormatError: The API Key contains illegal characters.
settings.apiKeySaveSuccess: The API Key was saved successfully.
